readability_reflection: I feel like string concatention is easier for me since it looks like c++, instead of using + we use <<
comprehension_debugging: I think I was often confused about what was in the quotations, which would limit my ability to see what exactly was being printed
preference_rationale: I'd go with concatention since it's easier for me to read even though interpolation is generally easier. My c++ background made it easier.
learning_curve: I have some experience using interpolation in python and none with concatenation but since I use c++ more often it was easier to read than interpolation
suggestions_improvement: Not particularly, since when I read it I just compared a language I knew and a language I'm decently familiar with,
